Namespace

Classes

AICarPathFollower

A Unity script that controls an AI car's path-following behavior in a racing game.

This script enables an AI car to follow a predefined path of waypoints, applying movement forces and rotation to navigate the track. It includes a picture-in-picture (PIP) camera for monitoring the AI car and handles collision detection with the player car to trigger game over. It also manages stuck detection and respawn logic.

CameraFollow

A Unity script that controls a camera to follow a target car in a racing game.

This script enables the camera to smoothly follow a specified car (player or AI) with a configurable offset, maintaining a minimum height to avoid clipping through the ground. It also supports switching between multiple target cars and optionally displays the car's speed on a UI speedometer.

This code is part of Arcade Car Physics for Unity by Saarg (2018), distributed under the MIT License (see LICENSE.md). AI-generated-content:
  • tool: Grok
  • version: 3.0
  • usage: Generated using the prompt "我想要基于Unity制作一个赛车小游戏，现在我要实现camera跟随小车脚本，你能帮我写一下控制脚本吗", and directly copied from its response.

CameraSwitch

Manages camera switching functionality in the game.

CarActivation

CarActivation.CarConfiguration

CarClickHandler

A Unity script that handles click events on a car to load a target scene and pass the car's ID.

This script detects mouse clicks on a car GameObject, stores the car's unique ID using PlayerPrefs, and loads a specified scene (e.g., a car detail scene) in a racing game. It also includes raycast-based click detection for debugging purposes.

AI-generated-content
  • tool: Grok
  • version: 3.0
  • usage: Generated using the prompt "我想要基于Unity制作一个赛车小游戏，现在我要实现如何设置点击某一辆小车就跳转到某个scene，并且同时还把小车的id给传过去？，你能帮我写一下控制脚本吗", and directly copied from its response.

CarInitializer

A Unity script that initializes a networked car in a multiplayer racing game.

This script configures the camera, speedometer, lap tracker, and camera switching for a car owned by the local player. It ensures that only the local player's car is fully initialized with UI and camera bindings.

CarNameDisplay

A Unity script that displays a player's name above their car in a multiplayer racing game.

This script synchronizes the player's name across the network and updates the UI text color to distinguish the local player's car (green) from others (white).

CarRotation

A Unity script that controls the smooth rotation of a car GameObject in a racing game.

This script applies a continuous, smooth rotation to a car around its Y-axis, with the target angle determined based on the car's initial orientation. It is designed for visual effects or specific gameplay mechanics in a racing game.

Contribution Clarification: Originally sourced from Unity Asset Store - Low Poly Playable Vehicles.

Checkpoint

A Unity script that manages checkpoint behavior in a racing game.

This script is attached to checkpoint trigger colliders to detect when a player car passes through, updating the race state via LapCounter and disabling visual effects like light beams and particle systems. It also supports resetting the checkpoint to its initial state.

AI-generated-content
  • tool: Grok
  • version: 3.0
  • usage: Generated using the prompt "我想要基于Unity制作一个赛车小游戏，现在我要实现存档点和记录点实现存档和如果不经过这些点不能正常结束游戏，你能帮我写一下控制脚本吗", and directly copied from its response.

ClearAllTerrainsTool

A Unity Editor tool for clearing all trees and grass details from terrains in the scene.

This tool provides a menu option in the Unity Editor to remove all terrain trees and grass details from all terrains found in the current scene. It is useful for resetting terrain vegetation during development of a racing game or similar projects.

AI-generated-content
  • tool: Grok
  • version: 3.0
  • usage: Generated using the prompt "我想要基于Unity制作一个赛车小游戏，现在我要实现清除地形上所有的草，你能帮我写一下控制脚本吗", and directly copied from its response.

CountdownUI

A Unity script that displays a countdown timer UI in a racing game.

This script manages a countdown sequence, updating a UI text element and destroying itself after displaying "Go!" at the end of the countdown.

DayNightCycle

Manages the day-night cycle in the game, controlling sun and moon lighting based on time and weather.

FinishLineTrigger

A Unity script that detects when a car crosses the finish line in a racing game.

This script is attached to a trigger collider representing the finish line. It notifies the LapCounter when a car tagged as "Player" or "AI" crosses the finish line, potentially triggering race completion or lap increment logic.

AI-generated-content
  • tool: Grok
  • version: 3.0
  • usage: Generated using the prompt "我想要基于Unity制作一个赛车小游戏，现在我要实现小车经过终点线，可以出发结束页面，你能帮我写一下控制脚本吗", and directly copied from its response.

GameResultUI

A Unity script that displays race results in a multiplayer racing game.

This script populates a UI panel with race results, showing player ranks, names, and finish times, and provides a button to return to the main menu.

HostUI

A Unity script that manages the host UI for a multiplayer racing game.

This script sets up a network host, generates a password, selects a port, displays network details, manages the player list, and allows the host to start the game or kick players.

JoinUI

A Unity script that manages the client join UI for a multiplayer racing game.

This script handles user input for joining a server, including IP, port, password, and player name, and transitions to the waiting room upon successful connection.

KeyImageSwitcher

Manages switching of RawImage textures based on keyboard input.

KeyImageSwitcher.KeyImagePair

Represents a pair of a key and its associated RawImage textures.

LandingUIController

LapCounter

A Unity script that manages core race mechanics in a racing game, including lap counting and timing.

This script handles lap counting, checkpoint validation, race timing, UI updates, and celebration effects. It also controls player and AI car states (e.g., enabling/disabling physics) and supports respawning to checkpoints. The script ensures that all checkpoints must be passed to complete a lap.

AI-generated-content
  • tool: Grok
  • version: 3.0
  • usage: Generated using the prompt "我想要基于Unity制作一个赛车小游戏，现在我要实现附着在车上的记圈脚本，同时实现游戏逻辑的控制，如....，你能帮我写一下控制脚本吗", and directly copied from its response.

LapTracker

A Unity script that tracks lap progress for a player's car in a multiplayer racing game.

This script manages lap counting, checkpoint validation, race timing, and UI updates for a racing game. It supports respawning to checkpoints and reports race completion to the server for the local player.

MultiplayerCheckpoint

A Unity script that manages checkpoint triggers in a multiplayer racing game.

This script detects when a local player's car passes through a checkpoint, updates the LapTracker, and disables visual effects like light beams and particles for the local client.

MultiplayerFinishLineTrigger

A Unity script that detects when a local player's car crosses the finish line in a multiplayer racing game.

This script triggers the LapTracker to update race progress when a locally controlled car passes the finish line. It ensures only player-controlled cars with local ownership are processed.

MultiplayerRacingManager

A Unity script that manages multiplayer race logic in a racing game.

This script coordinates race start, player spawning, countdown, and result reporting across the network. It tracks player readiness and finish times, displaying final results when all players complete the race.

MyButtonHandler

Handles button click events to load a specified scene in Unity.

StartLineTrigger

A Unity script that triggers the start of a race when a car crosses the start line.

This script is attached to a trigger collider representing the start line in a racing game. It detects when a car tagged as "Player" or "AI" enters the trigger and notifies the LapCounter to start the race logic.

AI-generated-content
  • tool: Grok
  • version: 3.0
  • usage: Generated using the prompt "我想要基于Unity制作一个赛车小游戏，现在我要实现小车经过startline之后开始游戏，你能帮我写一下控制脚本吗", and directly copied from its response.

TokenAuthenticator

A Unity script that implements token-based authentication for a multiplayer racing game using Mirror.

This script authenticates clients by comparing their token with the server's token, handling authentication messages and managing connection acceptance or rejection.

WaitingRoomUI

A Unity script that manages the waiting room UI in a multiplayer racing game.

This script displays a list of connected players, highlights the local player and host, and handles disconnection scenarios with a popup. It also allows players to quit to the main menu.

WeatherSystem

Manages the weather system, controlling rain, fog, and clear conditions in the game.

XNetworkManager

A Unity script that extends Mirror's NetworkManager for a multiplayer racing game.

This script manages network connections, scene changes, and player spawning, providing custom events for client connection and disconnection handling. It assigns host names and resets player numbers.

XPlayer

A Unity script that manages player state and behavior in a multiplayer racing game.

This script handles player number assignment, name synchronization, car selection, and spawning, as well as enabling control for the local player's car. It maintains a static player list for managing player numbers and notifies the race manager when ready.

Structs

RaceResult

A struct that stores the result of a player in a multiplayer racing game.

Contains the player's name and their finish time for ranking purposes.

TokenAuthenticator.AuthRequestMessage

A network message struct sent by clients to request authentication.

TokenAuthenticator.AuthResponseMessage

A network message struct sent by the server in response to an authentication request.

Enums

WeatherSystem.WeatherType

Defines the possible weather states.
